projects.title: My Personal Website
projects.description: This website is in construction - please excuse the mess! In the meantime, enjoy this night shot of Chicago that I took. And click the image if you want to see more pictures!

image.alt: Night view of Lake Shore Drive in Chicago

projects.title: Automatic Plant Watering System
projects.description: I do love having plants in my apartment - but I also always forget to water them (which is bad). That's why I'm putting up an automated system to do that for me.

image.alt: Plants at the Garfield Park Conservatory of Chicago

projects.title: Split-Flap Display
projects.description: Started this project with my roommate so that we can decorate our place. We're currently at the 3D modeling stage, figuring out which materials to use for easy machining and assembly.

image.alt: Plants at the Garfield Park Conservatory of Chicago
